metadata.title: CVE-2015-3174 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
mod/quiz/db/access.php in Moodle through 2.5.9, 2.6.x before 2.6.11, 2.7.xbefore 2.7.8, and 2.8.x before 2.8.6 does not set the RISK_XSS bit forgraders, which allows remote authenticated users to conduct cross-sitescripting (XSS) attacks via crafted gradebook feedback during manual quizgrading.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-3174` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 3.0.3+dfsg-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.3+dfsg-0ubuntu1').
